column2: UVUâ€™s College of Science Awarded $1 Million Grant
column3: Utah Valley University's College of Science has been awarded a $1 million grant to enhance its research capabilities and support its science programs.

column2: IU Health Receives $139M Grant to Train Forensic Nurses
column3: IU Health has received a $139 million grant to train forensic nurses specializing in cases of sexual assault, aiming to improve support and care for victims.

column2: West End Little League from Trenton, NJ Receives $25,000 Grant
column3: The West End Little League in Trenton, NJ, has been awarded a $25,000 grant to support its youth baseball programs and improve facilities.

column2: Latin Grammy Cultural Foundation Opens $130,000 Grant Program
column3: The Latin Grammy Cultural Foundation has launched a new grant program with $130,000 in funding to support music education and cultural projects.

column2: Community Market Awarded Nearly $168K Avedis Grant
column3: A community market has received a nearly $168,000 grant from the Avedis Foundation to expand its services and outreach initiatives.

column2: Joplin Area Habitat for Humanity Receives $10,000 Grant from the U.S. Bank Foundation
column3: The Joplin Area Habitat for Humanity has been awarded a $10,000 grant from the U.S. Bank Foundation to support its housing and community development projects.

column2: Rui Ni Awarded Grant to Study Turbulence
column3: Rui Ni has received a grant to research turbulence, focusing on its effects and implications across various scientific and engineering fields.

column2: Southampton Academy Receives Dollar General Literacy Foundation Grant
column3: Southampton Academy has been awarded a grant from the Dollar General Literacy Foundation to support and enhance its literacy programs.

column2: Flood-Displaced Residents Eligible for $1,000 Grants Through Realtors Relief Foundation
column3: Residents displaced by recent flooding can apply for $1,000 grants from the Realtors Relief Foundation to aid in their recovery efforts.

column2: Water Infrastructure Grants to Be Allocated to Local Municipalities
column3: Local municipalities are set to receive water infrastructure grants to improve and upgrade their water systems and facilities.
